text: (Napiye!) Yutarkalum, kiristavarkalum avarkal valiyai nir pinparratavaraiyil um'maipparri tiruptiyataiya mattarkal. (Akave, avarkalai nokki;)"niccayamaka allahvin vali-(islam) atuve nervali" enru collum;. Anri nanam um'mai vantatainta pinnarum avarkalutaiya iccaikalaip pinparruvireyanal, allahvitamiruntu um'maik kapparrupavanum, umakku utavi ceypavanum illai
